name: FreedomPay
author: FreedomPay

sections.description: You can easily receive payments using FreedomPay Payments Provider.
sections.installation:
These steps should be made for module’s correct work:

  1. Sign documents with FreedomPay. To access the FreedomPay personal account, you need to fill a request form on:

    • https://freedompay.kz – for Kazakhstan
    • https://freedompay.kg – for Kyrgyzstan
    • https://freedompay.uz – for Uzbekistan

  2. Install and adjust the module. You can find the settings of this plugin in the “plugins” page of the admins’ console, or in WooCommerce settings page.

[Important] – next steps presume you already have WooCommerce module installed on your website:

  1. Module’s installation. Choose “Plugins → Add new” in admins’ console, press “Upload Plugin” button, choose zip-archive with plugin and then press “Install” button.
  2. Adjustment. Choose “WooCommerce → Settings” in admins’ console and proceed to “Payments” tab. Choose “FreedomPay” in the payment gateways list and proceed to settings.
    Fill in “Merchant ID” and “Secret Key” – these values can be found in https://my.freedompay.money. You can leave the rest settings as they go.
  3. After saving your settings, you will have FreedomPay payments available on your website.

short_description: You can easily receive payments using FreedomPay Payments Provider.
description: You can easily receive payments using FreedomPay Payments Provider.

upgrade_notice: To upgrade your version of WordPress, WooCommerce or PHP, please notice that FreedomPay plugin is currently compatible with PHP of version 7.4 and higher, WP of version 4.3 and higher, WC of a version not higher than 5.0.
